attributes.action: MPs only get salary. No bonuses/claims/expenses
attributes.additional_details:
MPs are constantly making claims on their second home, chauffeur driven cars, food, renovating houses.... (the list is never ending).

MPs should get their salary's and that's it. It means that MPs cannot cheat and there will be no need for all the unnecessary fuss that we currently have due to these scandalous MPs.

We know that MPs cannot stick to their promises and that their "sorry" does not mean anything. To prevent further fraud, we should stop giving MPs the freedom to make claims, even if they are genuine, as they simply cannot be trusted.

I hope you are with my on this and that you feel as passionately about this topic as I do.

Thank You
